activity_name: Record the data of each patient

substeps.description: Clerk initiates a new patient registration record in the hospital information system
Clerk verifies the patient's presence and registration intent
Clerk opens the data entry interface for patient demographic information

activity_name: Register the SSN of the patient

substeps.description: Clerk requests the patient's social security number or national identifier
Clerk validates the SSN format according to national rules
Clerk enters the SSN into the patient registration system

activity_name: Register the Name of the patient

substeps.description: Clerk requests the patient's given (first) name
Clerk verifies spelling with the patient or official document
Clerk records the patient's given name in the system

activity_name: Register the Surname of the patient

substeps.description: Clerk requests the patient's family name (surname)
Clerk confirms surname accuracy against identification documents
Clerk records the surname in the patient registration system
System consolidates registered patient data into a referral template
Clerk reviews the referral document for completeness
Clerk prints the referral document for patient use

activity_name: Archive the record in file system

substeps.description: System stores the finalized patient record in the hospital database
System links the archived record to the printed referral document
System confirms successful completion of patient registration
